What It Applies To: Emails that are already classified by "Contact Us" Form on site being filled
How is tag removed: Once Routed to A. NEEDS-INFO, CS-COMMS or Marked Spam
How it'll help: Automates reply and routing to contact form fills
Note: Already functional and should be excluded from incoming email triggers in Flowchart

What It Applies To: Emails that are already classified via "Following up on your order from Dads Printing" subject line rule
How is tag removed: Once Routed to A. CS-COMMS, Review Request Sent or remove manually once new order request response sent
How it'll help: Auto sends reviews on positive orders, forwards to CS and notifies on Reorders
Note: Already functional and should be excluded from incoming email triggers in Flowchart
